title: Shortcut to send an email or a notification on the mobile application
content: This button  has been added to the employee file to be able to send an email or notification to the employee's mobile app with one click.⚠️The employee's email must be entered in the employee file. Method here.When you send a message, the employee receives an email + notification on the mobile app.The body of the message can only be read via email.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
